name: T - Carlos Fernando
_source: speak;Carlos; Fernando!{w} How long has it been since these two great minds have come together?
speak;Fernando; A bit <bconvo>too</> long, my friend.{w} How've you been?
speak;Carlos; I wish I could say I'm better{tgm}...{tgm}{w} I think Kate is going to make a throw rug with my skin for letting Luna fight these monsters.
speak;Fernando; Ah, best of luck.{w} I wouldn't want to be you.
speak;Carlos; How optimistic{tgm}...{tgm}{w} How's the rest of The Defiants, anyway?
speak;Fernando; They're fine.{w} Nina's still stealing.{w} Alexis is sitll punching.{w} Sarah is still doubting herself.{tgm}...{tgm}{w} So nothing's changed.
speak;Carlos; Ha, consistency is comfort.{w} Let's catch up some more later. We've got some demons to kill!
